name: Flash Cannon
description: You gather energy from the light around you and send a concentrated beam towards a creature in range. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE steel damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
